name: Svalboard Vial Definition
author: Morgan Venable
notes: This is a Vial Keymap template for Svalboard

customKeycodes.title: Increase the DPI of the left pointing device.
customKeycodes.name: SV_LEFT_DPI_INC

customKeycodes.title: Decrease the DPI of the left pointing device.
customKeycodes.name: SV_LEFT_DPI_DEC

customKeycodes.title: Increase the DPI of the right pointing device.
customKeycodes.name: SV_RIGHT_DPI_INC

customKeycodes.title: Decrease the DPI of the right pointing device.
customKeycodes.name: SV_RIGHT_DPI_DEC

customKeycodes.title: Toggle if the left pointer is scroll or pointer.
customKeycodes.name: SV_LEFT_SCROLL_TOGGLE

customKeycodes.title: Toggle if the right pointer is scroll or pointer.
customKeycodes.name: SV_RIGHT_SCROLL_TOGGLE

customKeycodes.title: Reset the calibration of the pointing device
customKeycodes.name: SV_RECALIBRATE_POINTER

customKeycodes.title: Cycle between various settings of the mouse keys timer.
customKeycodes.name: SV_MH_CHANGE_TIMEOUTS

customKeycodes.title: Toggle layer 2 and 3, if 4 and 5 also active toggle 6 and 7
customKeycodes.name: SV_TOGGLE_23_67

customKeycodes.title: Toggle layer 4 and 5, if 2 and 3 also active toggle 6 and 7
customKeycodes.name: SV_TOGGLE_45_67

customKeycodes.title: Hold to toggle the pointer's scroll status.
customKeycodes.name: SV_SCROLL_HOLD

customKeycodes.title: Output the current internal state of the keyboard.
customKeycodes.name: SV_OUTPUT_STATUS
